text: qualification. Apprenticeships and traineeships Apprenticeships and traineeships combine training and employment. Learn on the job and earn money while studying a nationally recognised qualification. Short courses and microcredentialsBuild new and in-demand skills with RMIT short courses and microcredentials - standalone learning with on online and in-person options designed to support your personal and career goals.
